answers: Cancer secure cover provides financial protection against early major and advanced stages of cancer.

questions: What stages of cancer does Cancer Secure plan cover?
answers: We cover three stages of cancer - Early stage, Major Stage and Advanced stage.

questions: If I claim for an early stage cancer, will my policy continue after the claim is paid?
answers: Yes, you can claim for an early cancer and then also claim for major or Advanced cancer. Upon detection of an early stage cancer 50% of Sum Insured, maximum up to Rs. 10 Lacs is payable. In the event of a major or advanced stage cancer, a pay-out of 100% of sum insured would be made and the policy would end. Therefore, you are entitled to a maximum pay out of up to 150% of sum insured.

questions: If I claim for a major stage cancer, will my policy continue after the claim is paid?
answers: No, policy for you shall terminate after a claim for major stage cancer is made. You shall be provided with 100% of Sum Insured on detection of a major stage cancer.

questions: If I claim for an Advanced stage cancer, will my policy continue after the claim is paid?
answers: No, policy for you shall terminate after a claim for advanced stage cancer is made. You shall be provided with 150% of Sum Insured on detection of an advanced stage cancer.

questions: What is the survival period under this plan?
answers: The payment under this plan the benefit is subject to survival of the Insured for 7 days following the detection of cancer.

questions: Are there any optional covers under the plan?
answers: Yes, you can opt for a Second E-opinion where you can take a second opinion on the critical illness from a panel of medical practitioners. You can also opt for a Wellness coach to get access to an expert who will guide you on the path of good health by advising you on fitness, nutrition and more.

questions: Is there an age limit for opting for a Cancer Secure plan?
answers: The minimum entry age is 18 years and the maximum entry age is 65 years

questions: What is the basis of determining the sum insured under Cancer secure plan?
answers: Your income is a determining factor for your sum insured. For more details, please consult your sales advisor.

questions: Will I be able to cover my non-earning spouse, children and parents under the policy?
answers:
Yes, your non-earning children and parents are eligible for the below Sum Insured value:

  1. Non-earning Spouse– 50% of Proposer’s sum insured/eligibility or 30L whichever is lower.
  2. Non-earning Parent/ Parent in laws – 50% of Proposer’s sum insured/eligibility or 10L whichever is lower.
  3. Children/Student – 50% of Proposer’s sum insured/eligibility or 15L whichever is lower.

questions: How long is my Policy valid for?
answers: We offer you an option of buying our health policy for 1 year, 2 years and 3 years’ term. You can renew your policy at the end of policy term.

questions: Will I get a discount on a 2 or a 3-year policy tenure?
answers: A long term discount of 7.5% and 10% on premium is applicable on selecting a policy terms of 2 and 3 years respectively. This will apply only in case of Single Premium Policies.

questions: Until what age can I renew my Policy?
answers: We offer lifetime renewability for this health plan, subject to payment of premium and fulfilment of other policy conditions.

questions: How should I claim benefit under the Cancer Secure plan?
answers:
You need to submit the following documents to us within 30 days of occurrence of the event:

  • Completed Claim form
  • Medical certificate confirming the diagnosis of condition
  • Certificate confirming that the claim doesn’t relate to Pre-Existing Disease or any Illness/ Injury which was diagnosed within the first 90 days  
  • Photocopy of indoor case papers (if applicable)
  • Photocopy of first consultation letter and subsequent prescriptions
  • Specific documents (if any) listed under the respective condition

questions: Who can I purchase the policy for?
answers: You can purchase the policy for yourself and include your spouse up to four children, and yours and your spouse’s parents

questions: I want to cover my 4 family members. Do I get any discounts?
answers: You can avail a discount of 10% on premium on covering 2 or more family members in a single policy.

questions: What are the premium payment options under this policy?
answers: You can choose to buy this Policy by paying a single premium, or you can choose premium payment on instalment basis. Monthly/quarterly/semi-annual instalment options are available for Policies with Policy Period of 1 year.
